title: Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit | 25 Guided STEM Experiment Lessons | 48 Page Color Student Guide | Grades 3-6 | Ages 8+ | Play & Learn | Parents' Choice Silver Award Winner
descriptions:
Introducing the Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit! This educational kit is perfect for children in grades 3-6, aged 8 and above, who are interested in exploring the fascinating world of motors, generators, and electrical currents. 

With 25 guided experiments included, this science kit provides an engaging hands-on learning experience. The accompanying student guide, consisting of 48 color pages, helps children grasp the concepts with ease. 

The kit has received the prestigious Parents' Choice Silver Award, a testament to its educational value and quality. The comprehensive full-color manual, published in 2012 and spanning 60 pages, further enhances the learning process.

Featuring an electric motor with transparent plastic, this kit allows children to observe the inner workings of the motor as it converts electricity into motion. Additionally, the motor can be reconfigured into a hand-crank electric generator, providing a deeper understanding of how motion can be converted into electricity. 

The kit also delves into the exploration of magnetic fields and electric currents, enabling children to learn about these fundamental scientific concepts in an interactive way. 

Measuring 13.1 inches in height, 8.9 inches in width, and 2.6 inches in depth, this kit is compact and easy to store. With a weight of just 1.3 pounds, it is lightweight and portable, making it convenient for both classroom and home use.

The Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit falls under the category of electronic learning and is a fantastic addition to any STEM-focused curriculum. It offers a wide range of learning outcomes, including understanding the function of electric motors and generators, as well as the principles of magnetic fields and electric currents.

The components of the kit are made from transparent plastic, allowing children to see the inner workings of the motor and generator. The kit includes a battery-powered motor and can be reconfigured into a hand-crank electric generator, providing versatility and multiple learning opportunities.

In addition to the guided experiments, children can also delve into magnetism, build simple circuits, and learn about gears and drive-trains through the kit's various experiments.

Overall, the Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit is an excellent choice for children interested in STEM education. It provides a comprehensive learning experience, fosters curiosity, and encourages hands-on exploration of key scientific principles. Don't miss out on this exciting opportunity to spark your child's interest in the world of motors, generators, and electricity!

Overall, the Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit offers an engaging and educational experience for young learners. It fosters critical thinking, problem-solving skills, and an appreciation for the fascinating world of science. Get ready to spark curiosity and ignite a passion for learning with this exceptional electronic learning resource!
